properties.Name: Activity
properties.Description:
Activities, Interests and Opinions are the foundation of Psychographics and Psychographic Segmentation.     

Activities, Interests and Opinions equate to 'lifestyle'.    

Activities, Interests and Opinions (AIO) are the basis for understanding consumer buying behavior as a function of their lifestyle.

Activities describe what a consumer 'does', such as occupation, hobbies, entertainment.

Ex:
Activity =  "Cooking"
Activity Type = "Personal Interest"

Activity =  "Golf"
Activity Type = "Personal Sports

Activity =  "Mutual Fund Investing"
Activity Type = "Finance"

Sales, marketing and advertising activities are often planned for or targeted at groups involved in or interested in specific activities.

Each organization will identify, define and track a specific set of AIOs to gather information about, define consumers and make decisions.

Columns.Name: ActivityId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Activity.

Columns.Name: ActivityTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Activity Type.

Properties.Description:
Activities, Interests and Opinions are the foundation of Psychographics and Psychographic Segmentation.     

Activities, Interests and Opinions equate to 'lifestyle'.    

Activities, Interests and Opinions (AIO) are the basis for understanding consumer buying behavior as a function of their lifestyle.

Activities describe what a consumer 'does', such as occupation, hobbies, entertainment.

Ex:
Activity =  "Cooking"
Activity Type = "Personal Interest"

Activity =  "Golf"
Activity Type = "Personal Sports

Activity =  "Mutual Fund Investing"
Activity Type = "Finance"

Sales, marketing and advertising activities are often planned for or targeted at groups involved in or interested in specific activities.

Each organization will identify, define and track a specific set of AIOs to gather information about, define consumers and make decisions.
